title: Numerous T227s Available for Sale-Rare Opportunity
author: ezez420

posts.post_title: Numerous T227s Available for Sale-Rare Opportunity
posts.post_content:
I have a few T227 Cards for Sale all authentic and unaltered.  These are hard to find.  This is what I am looking to get rid of at the moment.  Cards are sold individually with no discount on multiple purchases.  These cards are not offered very often for sale but I've upgraded a few and had doubles.  Send email for pictures.    

Willie Hoppe-Miners PSA 1
De Oro-Miners raw
Jack McDermott-HLC PSA 1
Ess K-PSA 1 Miners
Goodwin-PSA Miners 1.5

Zybysko-PSA 1.5 HLC
Zybysko-raw
Attell-Miners raw
Mulford-Miners raw
Klaus-PSA 1-Miners

any prices?

looks like quite a good group.

all the best,
barry
